name: UIDropInteractionDelegate
desc: The interface for configuring and controlling a drop interaction.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, canHandle: UIDropSession) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether it can handle the session’s drag items.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, performDrop: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate it can request the item provider data from the session’s drag items.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, sessionDidEnter: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the drop session has moved into the drop interaction’s view.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, sessionDidUpdate: UIDropSession) -> UIDropProposal
items.desc: Tells the delegate the drop session has changed.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, sessionDidExit: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the drop session has moved out of the drop interaction’s view.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, sessionDidEnd: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the drop session has ended.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, item: UIDragItem, willAnimateDropWith: UIDragAnimating)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the system's drop animation is about to start.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, previewForDropping: UIDragItem, withDefault: UITargetedDragPreview) -> UITargetedDragPreview?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the targeted drag item preview to show during the drop animation.

items.name: func dropInteraction(UIDropInteraction, concludeDrop: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the drop activity and its related animations have finished.
